code: import{GET_DATA}from"./actions";import produce from'immer';var initialState={data:[]};var dataReducer=function dataReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_DATA:{return produce(state,function(draftState){draftState.data=action.payload;});}default:{return state;}}};export default dataReducer;
